entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:57 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 39 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -15.2°C
Wind: ENE 27 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets in the morning then to freezing rain and a few flurries late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 7 in the evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain and a few flurries ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to 7 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
